ObjectClass.Name: Longbow Heavy Cruiser
ObjectClass.Description:
LONGBOW HEAVY CRUISER: Nuclear equipped, multi-role gunship Strong splash damage vs gnd and air
Devastating vs dense, long-range targets Weak against heavy vehicles
Reloads Micro-Nuke at MACROFABs

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 9 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 26, Aggro Radius: 34

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 120, R 30, SR 5, Sta S\Air: 120, R 30, SR 5, Sta S

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\if in range of a Chronoporter or Slipgate \ \Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires Gate Tech\ upgrade at your TELEPORTER

Objective.Name: Fire Micro-Nuke
Objective.Details: \Nuke the targeted location \ \dmg: 240 hp, R 36, SR 24
